subject: order #SSN1856
description_text: My parcel appears to be stuck in Transit, It hasn't moved in 2 weeks.        https://www.yuntrack.com/parcelTracking?id=YT2517800704493605

conversations.body_text: Hi John Gordon,  We will promptly contact YunExpress to check if there’s any issue with the shipment. Once we receive a response, we’ll provide you with a solution as soon as possible.

Hey,

Did you hear back from the courier? Still hasn't moved from the 30th of june.


________________________________

Hi John Gordon,     Your parcel was returned to the logistics provider due to charged, we have asked the logistics provider to change the order and resend it, this is your new logistics order number. YT2519600706227227
